metadata.title: CVE-2024-27982 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The team has identified a critical vulnerability in the http server of themost recent version of Node, where malformed headers can lead to HTTPrequest smuggling. Specifically, if a space is placed before acontent-length header, it is not interpreted correctly, enabling attackersto smuggle in a second request within the body of the first.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
